help_message_text:
Commands:
	/sub Subscribe to RSS feed
	/unsub Unsubscribe from feed
	/list View current subscriptions
	/set Configure subscription settings
	/check Check current subscriptions
	/setfeedtag Set subscription tags
	/setinterval Set subscription refresh interval
	/activeall Activate all subscriptions
	/pauseall Pause all subscriptions
	/help Help
	/import Import OPML file
	/export Export OPML file
	/unsuball Unsubscribe from all feeds
	For detailed usage instructions visit: https://github.com/zintus/flowerss-bot
ping_command_desc: Ping the bot to check connectivity
activeall_success_channel: All subscriptions for channel [%s](https://t.me/%s) have been enabled.
addsub_hint_no_url_chat: Please provide the RSS URL after the command, e.g., %s https://justinpot.com/feed/
addsub_err_already_subscribed: Already subscribed to this feed. Please do not subscribe again.
addsub_hint_no_url_channel: For channel subscriptions, please use the command: /sub @ChannelID URL
addsub_err_not_channel_admin: You or the Bot are not an administrator of this channel, cannot set up subscription.
export_err_get_channel_admin_info: Unable to get channel administrator information
export_err_channel_admin_only: Only channel administrators can perform this operation
export_err_get_source_info: Failed to get subscription source information
import_handle_instruction: Please send the OPML file directly. If importing for a channel, include the channel ID when sending, e.g. @telegram
err_not_channel_admin_action: This action can only be performed by a channel administrator.
ondoc_err_not_opml: Please send a correct OPML file.
pauseall_success_channel: All subscriptions for channel [%s](https://t.me/%s) have been enabled.
unsuball_confirm_message: Do you want to unsubscribe from all feeds?
err_admin_only_operation: This operation can only be performed by an administrator.
unsub_hint_channel_usage: To unsubscribe a channel, use the command: '/unsub @ChannelID URL'
unsub_info_select_feed_to_unsub: Please select the feed you want to unsubscribe from
unsub_err_not_subscribed_feed: Not subscribed to this RSS feed
set_info_select_feed_to_configure: Please select the feed you want to configure
set_err_user_not_subscribed: User not subscribed to this RSS feed
setfeedtag_usage_hint: /setfeedtag [sourceID] [tag1] [tag2] Set subscription tags (max 3 tags, separated by spaces)
setsubtagbtn_usage_hint_format:
Please use the `/setfeedtag %d tags` command to set tags for this subscription. `tags` are the tags to be set, separated by spaces. (Up to three tags)
For example: `/setfeedtag %d Technology Apple`
setinterval_usage_hint: /setinterval [interval] [sourceID] Set subscription refresh interval (multiple source IDs allowed, separated by spaces)
setinterval_err_invalid_interval: Please enter a valid refresh interval.
bot_broadcast_source_error_format: [%s](%s) has failed to update %d times in a row and has been paused.
middleware_err_not_chat_admin: You are not an administrator of the current chat.
language_set_fail_invalid_code_format: Invalid language code: %s. Please choose from the available languages.
